title: Ruthless Love
description: There are three men in my life, and I don't know what to do.I'm engaged to be married.To a man I don't love.He's hot, rich, and won't take no for an answer no matter how many times I break up with him.Oh, and he just might be the Russian mob.It was arranged by my father.The one who thinks the world is his chess board ...And I'm his biggest pawn.But there's a third man in my life.The one I can't avoid.The one who doesn't know I exist.The gorgeous guy across the street who wears the sexiest smile... And very little else.So, I've watched a little more than I should.But who can blame me?His tattoos are distracting.And I need a distraction.I never imagined...All this time...He's been watching me back.A friends-to-lovers stand alone romance that intertwines with The Ruthless Billionaires Series. This book contains no cheating.Full Steam Ahead. Lexxi James Books are seductive, suspenseful romances filled with fun, sensual, and sizzling high-heat love scenes.
author: Lexxi James
